title.jp: Xam'd at the Dawn of War

synopsis: When a peaceful island is dragged into a violent war, a young boy transforms into a powerful mecha/human hybrid known as Xam’d.
Akiyuki is taken aboard the air ship Zanbani to control the dangerous power of the mysterious mecha within him.
Though Nakiami tries to help Akiyuki control the Xam’d within him, the deadly humanforms are still drawn to its power.
A mysterious seer helps Akiyuki discover clues about the purpose of the Xam’d. Meanwhile, the Free Zone military builds an anti-humanform base.
Nakiami has a secret meeting with the black market pirate Zeygend. And the military begin using innocent Islanders in their humanform experiments.
Akiyuki’s friends join the Free Zone military. And Nakiami disobeys Captain Ishu in order to save a humanform from turning into stone.
When the Free Zone military attacks a humanform, they discover a shocking secret about the creature they mean to destroy. Akiyuki begins a dangerous mission.
When the tracking device fails, Nakiami sets out to find Akiyuki. Also, Haru and Furuichi’s mission to find an ASP suit is only a cover for a much darker purpose for General Kakisu.
The crew of the Zanbani celebrates the return of Raigyo. Dr. Kanba begins to use the green soulstone to perfect the anti-humanform weapons.
The truth about Raigyo’s connection with the Xam’d is revealed. And Akiyuki finds a reluctant mentor.
The Zanbani is attacked by a squadron of humanforms. The mysterious leader of the humanforms demand to have the Xam’d turned over to them.
After the Zanbani crashes, the crew begins making repairs. But Nakiami and Akiyuki decide to strike out on their own.
When Nakiami and Akiyuki return to Sentan Island, they find Furuichi has experienced a dangerous transformation.
Furuichi’s jealousy of Akiyuki begins to exert a dark and dangerous power over the Xam’d within him.
Akiyuki is captured by slave traders while Nakiami befriends a young boy who is also possessed by Xam’d.
Sukakki enlists Midori in a dangerous military experiment, while Akiyuki is purchased by a mysterious stranger.
Akiyuki seems to recover under the care of a kindly but mysterious woman. Kakisu pressures Kanba to accelerate his dangerous experiments.

title.jp: What Can You See from There?

synopsis: When Nakiami returns to Tessik, their leader Kujireika tries to persuade her to join their tribe.
A captured enemy brings Professor Kanba to his knees and pushes General Kakisu to a dangerous rage.
The Far East Autonomy begins their deadly air strike forcing Kujireika to retaliate.
Lord Azami reveals he knows the real reason for General Kakisu’s bloodlust. Shiroza takes Akiyuki deep inside enemy lines.
When Shiroza finds he cannot convince Akiyuki and Haru to join his cause, he takes drastic measures against them.
The Hiruken Emperor reveals himself at last, and the crew of the Zanbani suffers a devastating casualty.
Now overtaken by grief and her new powers as a test type Xam’d, Midori wreaks havoc on the warfront.
Akiyuki brings the fullness of his Xam’d powers to stop the Hiruken Emperor’s attack.

title.jp: The Great Rock and the Girl

synopsis: Akiyuki strikes a bargain with the Hiruken Emperor in order to save the world.
